nodes.text: This individual was a human male officer who served the First Order during its conflict with the Resistance. He was stationed in the primary fire control room of the Starkiller Base superweapon, under the command of Colonel Erich S. Datoo, at the time of the Hosnian Cataclysm.
This character was portrayed by Tom Edden in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. His role was confirmed in the movie's credits.
